name: chatflow-pro
description: A comprehensive WhatsApp chatbot management platform

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:whatsapp"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../whatsapp-service && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:whatsapp
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:whatsapp
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:db: cd backend && npm run migrate && npm run seed

author: ChatFlow Pro Team
